resources.string: This App allows you to test whether or not Push Notifications are working on your phone and network. It will perform a series of checks and will give you feedback if one of the steps fails.
To start the test please click the button on the bottom.
Your phone can receive push notifications without any problems.
Step 1 will check whether all prerequisites for receiving push notifications are met.

You can now request a push notification to be sent to your device. If you want to test the behaviour after your device goes to sleep use the slider below to delay the sending of the notification on the server.
Step 3 will request a push notification from the server and will check whether your device can receive it properly.

(c) 2015 by Bernd Bindreiter.

Icons from Google's Material Icon set: https://www.google.com/design/icons/
